sentences.en: ‘I'd like your help tomorrow. ’ ‘Can you be more specific (= tell me exactly what you want) ? ’
sentences.cn: 我想让你明天来帮帮我。”“你能不能说得具体些？”

sentences.en: a specific example of alcohol’s effect on the body
sentences.cn: 酒精对身体影响的具体例子

sentences.en: Afternoon groups relate to the specific addictions and problems therein.
sentences.cn: 下午的小组谈到具体的上瘾病例以及其中的问题。

sentences.en: games suitable for specific age groups
sentences.cn: 适合特定年龄组的游戏

sentences.en: I asked him to be more specific.
sentences.cn: 我要求他说得更具体些。

sentences.en: List in the spaces below the specific changes you have made.
sentences.cn: 在下面空白处列出你所作的具体改动。

sentences.en: Mr Howarth gave us very specific instructions.
sentences.cn: 豪沃思先生给了我们很明确的指示。

sentences.en: She was not calculating and evidenced no specific interest in money.
sentences.cn: 她没什么心计，而且能感觉出她对钱没什么兴趣。

sentences.en: Special programmes of study are tailored to the needs of specific groups.
sentences.cn: 制订特殊课程，以满足特定群体的需要。

sentences.en: Specific groups may be formed to address specific issues.
sentences.cn: 可能会组成特别小组去解决特定问题。

sentences.en: Thanks to a new EU directive, insecticide labelling will be more specific.
sentences.cn: 根据欧盟的一项新指令，杀虫剂的标签标注将更加明确。
这位候选人的讲话只是泛泛之谈。

sentences.en: The council wants to dish the money out to specific projects.
sentences.cn: 理事会想把钱分配到具体的工程。

sentences.en: The debate revolves around specific accounting techniques.
sentences.cn: 这场争论的焦点是具体的会计技术。

sentences.en: The report was redrafted to remove gender-specific language.
sentences.cn: 重新起草这个报告，删除带有性别特点的语言。

sentences.en: The specific impact of the greenhouse effect is unknowable.
sentences.cn: 温室效应的具体影响无法知道。

sentences.en: Troops have agreed to stay within specific boundaries to avoid confrontations.
sentences.cn: 军队同意驻扎在特定地界内，以避免冲突。

sentences.en: Your decision must be translated into specific, concrete actions.
sentences.cn: 你的决定必须转化为具体明确的行动。

words.tran_cn: 专业，专长；特产；特性；招牌菜
[免疫] 特异性；特征；专一性
专攻（specialize的过去分词）；使…专门化；详细说明
指定；详细说明（specify的过去分词）
指定；详细说明；列举；把…列入说明书

phrases.tran_cn: 特殊请求；详细而具体的请求
比表面；比表面积；表面系数

trans.tran_en: a specific thing, person, or group is one particular thing, person, or group
